comment: They lecture about the subject matter in an easily digestible way using information gathered from the textbook. In addition to that, they are also very considerate when it comes to personal circumstances and willing to take time to discuss deadlines and anything relevant to class if you reach out to them.

This is one of the easiest classes I've ever taken, but it was also very boring and the professor was constantly disorganized and unprepared for class. Quizzes are easy, almost every test question was literally taken from the quizzes, you'd have nothing to worry about if you take this class. It just wasn't very interesting.

I loved prof Braswell. They were super chill and understanding if I needed to turn something late. They arent so far removed from college themself so it was really nice to have a professor who genuinely understood that college is a lot. 
Be respectful, make an effort, and pay attention to lectures and you will be fine.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: Dr. Braswell's class was very interesting and informative. There are weekly quizzes, a final paper, and 2 tests. I feel like the work got pretty boring after a while but everything is easy as long as you study.

dr. braswell was one of my favorite professors. their lectures are very detailed and attendance is mandatory. they are understanding when it comes to being absent. i used the quizzes to study for the tests, the tests have the same questions as the quizzes. participation is graded and attendance is taken every day. i had no issues all semester.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Amazing lectures

comment: I took 1102, and this professor is very biased and teaches and forces their leftist political views without considering others' beliefs. This is a very easy class, but if you disagree with them, they will do a lot to prove why they are right. They are very sweet but the class gets very boring fast.
strongly politically biased in her teachings, rapidly getting tired of her class and would not recommend anth 1102
